Explanation.Log Message: [2025-03-24 09:15:40] ERROR - DNS resolution failed for api.example.com

Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Observations: The system failed to resolve the DNS for api.example.com.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Impact: This could disrupt communication with the API server.
Detailed Root Cause Analysis.Correlations: Packet loss was detected on the eth0 interface around the same time.

Explanation.Conclusion: The DNS resolution failure is likely due to network connectivity issues or DNS server problems.
